meanings.definition: Careful consideration or anticipation of the future.
meanings.sent1: Her forethoughtfulness in packing extra snacks saved the day during the long road trip.
meanings.sent2: His forethoughtfulness in preparing for the presentation impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The forethoughtfulness of bringing an umbrella on a sunny day seemed unnecessary but proved useful when it suddenly rained.
meanings.sent4: The forethoughtfulness of a chess player is like planning several moves ahead in a game of strategy.
meanings.sent5: The forethoughtfulness of a squirrel storing nuts for winter is a lesson in preparedness.

meanings.definition: The quality of thinking or planning ahead.
meanings.sent1: Planning a surprise party requires a lot of forethoughtfulness to ensure it remains a secret.
meanings.sent2: The forethoughtfulness of the architect is evident in the well-designed building.
meanings.sent3: His forethoughtfulness in bringing a spare tire on the hike saved them from being stranded.
meanings.sent4: The forethoughtfulness of a detective is like solving a puzzle before all the pieces are revealed.
meanings.sent5: The forethoughtfulness of a gardener planting seeds in the right season leads to a bountiful harvest.

meanings.definition: The act of thinking about or planning for the future.
meanings.sent1: Her forethoughtfulness in budgeting allowed her to save for a dream vacation.
meanings.sent2: The forethoughtfulness of scheduling appointments in advance prevents last-minute chaos.
meanings.sent3: The forethoughtfulness of bringing a map on the hike avoided getting lost in the woods.
meanings.sent4: The forethoughtfulness of a captain charting a course through stormy seas is crucial for the safety of the crew.
meanings.sent5: The forethoughtfulness of a teacher preparing engaging lessons ensures student success.
